inclusion.criterion: early uni- or bilateral defect in pars interarticularis in the CT-scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of bony sclerosis on CT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of spondylolisthesis on standing lumbar radiographs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bone marrow edema in lumbar spinal MR images
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol consumption and smoking. He is healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
